cyclone.name: BARRY
cyclone.current_location: about 115 miles SSE of Morgan City, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to turn northwest later today, then north, moving inland across the central Louisiana coast and northward through the Mississippi Valley
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Louisiana coast (near Morgan City/Intracoastal City)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch: Mouth of the Mississippi River to Grand Isle, and Intracoastal City to Cameron, LA.  Tropical Storm Watch: East of the Pearl River to the MS/AL border.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning: Intracoastal City to Grand Isle, LA.  Tropical Storm Warning: Mouth of the Pearl River to Grand Isle, LA, including Lake Pontchartrain/Maurepas and Intracoastal City to Cameron, LA.  Storm-Surge Warning: Intracoastal City, LA to Biloxi, MS, including Lake Pontchartrain.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Main impact zone from the central Louisiana coast eastward to coastal Mississippi and Alabama
weather_observation.rain_fall_above_4_inch: Unlikely (most guidance keeps totals 1-3 inches on the upper Texas coast)
weather_observation.storm_surge_above_3_feet: Unlikely (surge axis focused east of Texas City)
weather_observation.wind: Occasional squalls with gusts 25-35 mph possible late Friday through Saturday
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected beyond minor tidal rise (<1 ft)
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain-bands could produce 1-3 inches of rain through Saturday night
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated brief tornadoes in outer rain-bands cannot be ruled out but risk is low for Texas City
